attributes.review: What a disgrace to our great president. The developers could be doing so much more for this app. Glitches, excessive notifications, and much more make this app personally a waste of my time and not worth the storage it takes up on my device. Do yourself a favor and just avoid it all together.✨🧚🏼
attributes.title: Waste of Time

attributes.review: This app caused me so much frustration at first whenever you opened the app it seemed to take me to a page advertising wigs and orange powder. Once I was able to log out I was taken to a page where videos of a racist,msygonistic person expressed their views on how Americans should live don’t recommend this app.
attributes.title: Unbelievably slow

attributes.review: I hate this app much when I opened the screen it told me to get off because I’m Italian and if I don’t give Donald trump money he’s going to send Emmy whole family back to Italy so please do not download this and after I deleted it a strange man called me and then my phone started glitching and everything so yeah don’t get it
attributes.title: Don’t get it

attributes.review: Baby girl this app gave me a virus and added extra apps in my phone also made my phone glitch it takes off the stuff u downloaded to. I would not give this app to my worst enemy this app is a disgrace this needed to be removed and I’m going to say again for the people in the back this app is a disgrace don’t get it
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: So I went to the store to get my food and then when I came back the food was gone, TRUMP TOOK MY FOOD! AND MY WIFE! So  then I came back to the store to get more food but guess what! TRUMP TOOK ALL THE FOOD IN THE STORE! So I rode my pet pterodactyl to go to my parents house for food but then! TRUMP WAS THERE TRYING TO TAKE MORE FOOD! So when I downloaded the app I got a virus/bug and now I can’t open my phone anymore. #ANYONE BUT TRUMP 2020!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: It’s a serious waste of time. As soon as you open it it crashes and then downloads a bunch of Cheeto coupons on your phone????? None of them work tho, tried it at Walmart and target. Cashier told me I was stupid for using them. All it brought was disappointment and shame into my life. Don’t try this app.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I thought this app would show me greatness and all it did was blind my eyes with horrible content. I’m scared. I’m devastated. I fear for the lives of those around me. I’m also binge eating now and am starting to turn orange. There is a glitch in this app and Beyond what’s stated above I am getting spam phone calls and weird emails.
attributes.title: I am just so surprised

attributes.review:
So my best friend’s sister’s boyfriend’s brother’s girlfriend heard from this guy who knows this kid who’s going with the girl who saw my friend telling me this at 31 flavors last night: This app will leave you in an infinite time loop of 2020 if you download it and make a creepy blueberry follow you, from outside your windows, forever! Blueberry outside your window like: 👁👄👁
💀
attributes.title: bESt rEviEw oUt THeRE nO 🧢

attributes.review: I got this app but I unfortunately couldn’t use it bc I had to walk my dishwasher! The app glitches and is especially difficult to use for non Karens and people with an actual brain. As someone who is educated, I think I speak for all of Gen Z when I say that trump needs to be cancelled. Trump just aint it sorry. Devito2020 ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤🤍🤎
attributes.title: Horrible app 🧶👠🌊❌💋💅🏽

attributes.review: The app ran terribly slow and at first I thought it was just my phone but then after clearing some space it was the same. The next day it got WORSE and my entire phone started glitching out. Ever since I downloaded this app my phone has never been the same! Do not download
attributes.title: HUGE regret
